subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Sales dropped nearly 40 percent in the next-to-the-last session of Keeneland’s September Yearling Sale. On Monday, 211 horses were sold for a total of $1,585,700, down 39.7 percent from 2007, when 243 horses brought $2,630,500.
snippet: Sales dropped nearly 40 percent in the next-to-the-last session of Keeneland’s September Yearling Sale. On Monday, 211 horses were sold for a total of $1,585,700, down 39.7 percent from 2007, when 243 horses brought $2,630,500.
